about_the_game:
Dive in and solve the mystery of Atlantis! Explore the depths in this Isometric Action-Game, fight against the Guardians and awaken the powers in your Anchor to uncover the truth behind the fall of the Civilization.

AN ACTION GAME WITH AN ANCHOR?: Use the powerful Atlantean artifact to make your way to the city gates. Grab, smash and tear apart guardians defending the ruins. Become stronger by unlocking new powers and attacks.

UPGRADE AND EXPLORE SEA PASSAGES: Retrieve all 4 magic rings, unlock ancient powers and potentials by collecting energy from enemies. Customize your playstyle thanks to the skill tree and choose a style that suits you.

UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY OF ATLANTIS: Dive into the seafloor and explore ancient ruins full of secrets and riches while encountering local wildlife. Retrieve old records to discover the history of those who came before us.

◉ Anchor started as an academic project by AIV - Accademia Italiana Videogiochi aimed at adding a production experience to the teaching carried out in the various courses, from the creation of the game concept to commercial publishing. The objective of this initiative is to give students the opportunity to collaborate with colleagues from other courses in the development of a video game project in which everyone can put the skills acquired during the lessons to the test and at the same time perfect their soft skills. ◉
